title: Chicken with sage and prosciutto
methods: Place Parma ham and a sage leaf on each breast and secure with a wooden cocktail stick.
Heat butter and oil in a large frying pan, then cook breasts on both sides for 5 mins.
Pour half the wine over the chicken, then leave to cook for a further 5 mins.
Add rest of wine to pan and leave to sizzle for a few seconds.
description: A simple, rustic chicken dish, which is pan fried and finished with a splash of Italian wine.
